```{r knitrOptions, include=FALSE}
options(digits = 4, width = 80)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  tidy = FALSE,
  include = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  dev = c('png'),
  fig.width = 6, fig.height = 3.5,
  dpi = 300, 
  fig.pos = 'H')
```

# 加载包
```{r}
library(pheatmap)
```

# 展示数据集
```{r}
browseVignettes("pheatmap")
```
